page.title: The input Element
page.description: This form control enables free-form data entry or a user interface component appropriate to the datatype of the bound node.

section.title: Text input control
section.description: This is the most common rendering of an input which is bound to a string value in the Instance.

section.title: Checkbox control
section.description: An input which binds to a Node of type 'boolean' is rendered as a Checkbox.

section.title: Datepicker control
section.description: An input which binds to a Node of type 'date' is rendered as a popup calendar control. The value may also be be typed in directly.

section.title: Datepicker control with datePattern
section.description: An input which binds to a Node of type 'date' is rendered as a popup calendar control. The value may also be be typed in directly. Through appearance="iso8601:datePattern" the format of the Date value can be customized. Typical format strings apply. See Dojo Docs.

ul.li: The date control is currently not fully accessible esp. keyboard navigation is not working in the current version of Dojo 1.3. Upcoming version 1.4 will fully support keyboard navigation.
Though locale-specific formatting of a date is supported there's no further support for subformats like the Java short/medium/long date formatting.
Known limitation: Dojo only accepts 'date'-inputs in the chosen datePattern or the ISO8601/RFC3339 format (yyyy-MM-dd).

section.title: DateTime picker control
section.description: An input which binds to a Node of type 'datetime' is rendered as a popup calendar and an associated time input control.

ul.li: The date control is currently not fully accessible esp. keyboard navigation is not working in the current version of Dojo 1.3. Upcoming version 1.4 will fully support keyboard navigation.
Though locale-specific formatting of a date is supported there's no further support for subformats like the Java short/medium/long date formatting.
